comments.body:
This yaml isn't formatted correctly so parsing is failing. It should be:
```
options:
  no_parent_owners: true
```
Fixing in #56904

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@# https://github.com/kubernetes/test-infra/issues/5197 is implemented.
options:
  - no_parent_owners: true
reviewers:
  - bgrant0607
